item.title: Notes about Solana
item.description: Useful links # Explorer # solana explorer NFT marketplace # solanart solasea Good articles to understand the concept of solana # Solana NFT 101 Solana’s Token Program, Explained Understanding Solana’s Mint Accounts and Token Accounts How NFTs are represented in Solana In the Solana world, data will be stored in different accounts.
